A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a visually stunning picture\, and that's about it.  They put out the money for visual effects. Its very beautiful to look at. Yet there is no substance to go with this movie. We got a  recycled movie here with aspects of Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. George Lucas messed up selling to Disney. They dropped the ball on this. I'm too angry to got into detail but this. I've had a 25 year love affair with Star Wars and this makes me want to quit on Star Wars. JJ Abrams good luck.
